fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
 CANDIDATE INFORMATION: 
▪ Full name : NGO HOANG TUAN CUONG 
▪ Date of birth: November 24th, 1990 
▪ Gender: Male 
▪ Place of birth: Quang Binh Province, Viet Nam 
▪ Degree: Engineer.  
▪ Graduation year: October, 2013. 
▪ Marital status: Single. 
▪ Language: Vietnamese (Native), English (Normal). 
CONTACT INFORMATION 
▪ Address: Binh Thanh District, HCMC.  
▪ Country: Viet Nam 
▪ Phone: (+84)0 1294 027 888 
▪ Email: nhtcuong90@gmail.com 
EXPERIENCE SUMMARY 
▪ 05 year of software developer experience. 
▪ Good at .NET(VB.NET, C# 3.0), NetCore 
▪ Knowledge JSP, PHP, Jquery. 
▪ Java Core, Android Java. 
▪ BackEnd: Restful Service(ServiceStack, WebApi C#) . 
▪ FrontEnd: Web ASP.NET,MVC 4 C# ,Android Java , Xamarin android and 
IOS ,Ionic 2, react native, angularjs, angular . 
▪ Server: Windows Server 2008 R2,2012,2016(IIS, Domain...) . 
▪ CI/CD: TeamCity  
▪ HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Pure . 
▪ Source Control: Git, TFS. 
▪ Web Sockets: SignalR(Microsoft) . 
▪ NoSQL: SQLite , MongoDb . 
▪ Rdbms: MsSQL, MySql, Oracle. 
▪ Concept: OOP, OOD, MVC. 
▪ Architecture: Domain Driven Design , knowledge React System . 
▪ Highly skillful in using development tools: 
• Visual Studio 2012 ,Visual Code and Xamarin Studio . 
SKILLS 
• Team Lead. 
• Team work,training . 
• Working independently . 
• Build Team .

WORKING HISTORY 
▪ May,2013- May ,2015:NewStead Company(C#,Java) 
▪ Jun,2015-Arp,2016:NTT Company(C#) 
▪ Arp,2016- Arp,2018:ThacoGroup Company(C#,Architecture) 
▪ Arp,2018- now: Nashtech company 
EDUCATION 
▪ 2001 – 2005: Dong Phu Junior High School. 
▪ 2005 – 2008: HuongHoa High School. 
▪ August, 2008 – October, 2013: Lac Hong University. 
o Major: Information Technology. 
o Mode of study: Full-time. 
o GPA: 6.75 (Please, View the Score table is attached). 
o Ability: .Net (VB.NET, C#), SQL Server,  ASP.Net. 
● January, 2010– January, 2012: Cisco Networking Academy. 
● Ability:  
● Configure and verify basic WAN serial connections including 
 serial, Point-to-Point  and Frame Relay. 
● Describe the functions of common security appliances and 
applications and the practices to secure network devices. 
● Describe, configure, apply, monitor, and troubleshoot Access 
Control Lists (ACL) based on network requirements. 
● Describe the importance, benefits, role, impact, and 
   components of  VPN technology . 
● Explain, configure, verify, and troubleshoot IP addressing 
   services including Network Address Translation (NAT), 
DHCP. 
HOBIES & INTERESTS 
▪ Reading book, listening to music, watching movies to relax. 
▪ Universe. 
CAPABILITIES 
▪ Working independently. 
▪ Maintaining good relationships with co-worker, everyone. 
▪ Having responsibility and work well in group. 
▪ Ability in communicating and persuading the other. 
▪ Enthusiastic, responsible for the work assigned and able to work with 
the pressure and high strength. 
▪ Fluency in office programs. 
▪ Always take the time to learn and research in work. 
▪ Handling high-pressure situation and deadlines. 
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION 
Become a programmer is not merely a means of living but a deep 
indulgence and non-stop dedication. I’m very self-confident that my skills 
and hard-working attitude will make a valuable contribution into 
profitability of the company. Besides, I’m always willing to encounter the 
challenging because I strongly believe: “There is nothing impossible for 
those who have strong wills”.

● Describe, configure, apply, monitor, and troubleshoot Access Control Lists (ACL) based on network requirements.
● Describe the importance, benefits, role, impact, and components of VPN technology . ● Explain, configure, verify, and troubleshoot IP addressing services including Network Address Translation (NAT), DHCP. HOBIES & INTERESTS ▪ Reading book, listening to music, watching movies to relax.
